name: SE2-05 — LANTERN ON COPOLIA
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Copolia Trail granite dome, Mahé. On Copolia's stone, light bends the reef.
Arc the rope where the shoreline turns.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: rope laid as precise arc; reef silhouette as protractor.
properties.clue:
On Copolia's stone, light bends the reef.
Arc the rope where the shoreline turns.
properties.visual_description: Lantern on polished granite; coastline arcs below; map parchment pinned with cutlass; parrot feather points along reef line.
